description: Precise active driver provides accurate and powerful bass while the passive radiator acts as a virtual speaker enhancing bass response, creating perfectly clear low frequencies. Passive Radiator technology provides a fully immersive auditory experience by creating deep bass with incredible clarity. Inline Mic allows phone calls to be taken with that same clarity.
title: Maxell   RAD-1 Radiator Enhanced Bass Earphones with In-line Mic  (190345)
